item.title: Using the best thinking models and not burn money (Jul 31st, 2025)
item.description: Intro I’ve been having a dilemma, I don’t want to pay open ai the monthly 20$ subscription, but I want to use the latest and greatest model on some of the problems I have to reduce time. How can I achieve this? I’ve already mentioned in a previous writing last year.. that I use open api keys. I started using mobile and desktop clients with just the api keys. Couple months ago OpenAI also reduced the pricing of o3 model by 80%, I’ve been using the ai very actively, trying to burn my credits as soon as possible.
